subject: Baseball
Sporting Goods
lead_paragraph: Steven Domalewski, a Wayne, N.J., teenager left brain-damaged after a line drive off a metal bat struck him, will receive $14.5 million to settle his lawsuit.
snippet: Steven Domalewski, a Wayne, N.J., teenager left brain-damaged after a line drive off a metal bat struck him, will receive $14.5 million to settle his lawsuit.
